nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems sent a number of agents on a mission to infiltrate a leisure satellite that was visiting in orbit of Coruscant.

At the leisure satellite's podracer arena, a squad of B1-Series battle droids attempted to construct a laser cannon with which to destroy the Senate Building on the surface of Coruscant. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, and Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano were present and prevented the battle droids from succeeding.

At the same time, Asajj Ventress infiltrated the satellite and locked it on a collision course with the Jedi Temple. Her efforts were thwarted thanks to intervention from Senator Padmé Amidala and Jedi Master Mace Windu.
